metadata.title: CVE-2018-1099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: DNS rebinding vulnerability found in etcd 3.3.1 and earlier. An attackercan control his DNS records to direct to localhost, and trick the browserinto sending requests to localhost (or any other address).

criterions.comment: etcd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
